snippet.title: Tails of Iron Gameplay Trailer - Future Games Show Gamescom 2021
snippet.description: Check out this new gameplay trailer for the Rat-cion adventure game Tails of Iron, which is narrated by Doug Cockle (Geralt of Rivia!). Tails of Iron is coming to PC, Xbox, PlayStation and Nintendo Switch on September 17, 2021.
